short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your ultimate companion for creating image prompts for AI image generators such as Midjourney, Flux, Stable Diffusion, DALLE.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prompt Catalyst helps you generate AI image prompts with style selection, lighting options, and more.

🌟 Key Features
🔮 AI-Powered Prompt Generation
Generate custom prompts with visual control.

🖼️ Image-to-Prompt Generation
Convert uploaded images into detailed prompts.

🎨 Craft Your Prompts
Input your ideas, and let our advanced AI algorithms generate visually rich prompts based on your specific preferences. Fine-tune each image prompt by selecting from various styles, lighting conditions, and camera angles.

📸 Camera Angle Selection
Experiment with different camera perspectives, such as close-ups, wide angles, and dynamic shots, to control the composition and framing of your images.

💡 Lighting Selection
Set the tone and mood of your images by selecting precise lighting conditions.

🖌️ Style Customization
Choose from a variety of artistic styles, such as photorealism, surrealism, or abstract art, to give your images a distinctive aesthetic that matches your creative vision.

🎛️ Creativity Control
Adjust the creativity value to influence how closely the generated prompts adhere to your input. Lower values produce more literal interpretations, while higher values encourage more imaginative and unexpected results.

📝 Prompt Length Control
Change the length of your prompts to suit your needs. Choose between concise, focused descriptions or more detailed, elaborate prompts to guide the AI image generation process.

🔄 Create Variations
Generate multiple variations of a single prompt for added inspiration.

📋 Copy to Clipboard
Quickly copy any generated prompt with a single click.

📏 Shorten Tool
Automatically create concise versions of longer prompts.

📝 Extend Tool
Add detailed elements to expand and enhance existing prompts.

🎨 Style Reference Codes
Browse a collection of Midjourney style reference codes to enhance your prompts. Each style code comes with a visual example, making it easy to understand its effect.

🎲 Random Prompt Generator
Use the random prompt feature to receive unexpected ideas and inspiration.

🖼️ Image Previews
Visualize your prompts: get real-time previews of your generated prompts. See how your ideas translate into visuals before using them with AI image generators.

⚡ Efficient Workflow
Save time by quickly assessing and refining prompts based on their previews.

📚 Comprehensive History Management
🗂️ Track Your Creations
Access a complete history of all your generated prompts, including custom, random, and variation prompts.

🗂️ Collections
Organize your prompts into folders using the Collections feature. Save your ideas systematically and download entire collections for offline use.

🔥 Prompts of the Week
🌈 Weekly Inspiration
Discover curated prompts featuring unique styles to help you explore new creative possibilities.

🖥️ User-Friendly Interface
🔄 Accessible Tabs
Switch between different sections like Generated Prompts, History, and Weekly Prompts with a single click.

🔓 Free Limits
15 Prompt Generations and 7 Preview Image Generations Daily.

💎 Premium Version Limits
≈5000 prompt and preview generations per month.
